name: Agents OZ
tagline: Software produced by the RMIT Agents Group
body:
## Who we are

AgentsOz is a moniker for the [Agent Group](https://sites.google.com/site/rmitagents/) within the [School of Computer Science and Information Technology](http://www.rmit.edu.au/about/our-education/academic-schools/computer-science-and-information-technology/) at [RMIT University](http://www.rmit.edu.au). The research group has three core research areas: *agent reasoning* (e.g., goal reasoning, plan coordination, failure recovery, goal-plan conflict/resolution), *agent-oriented software engineering* (e.g., design, testing, software methodologies & tools, automatic code generation) and *agent-based simulation* (including serious games and interactive simulation, application areas focussing on climate change adaptation and environmental issues.)

## Contact

This page is managed by Dhirendra Singh (@dhixsingh). For more information on our research, visit the group website at <https://sites.google.com/site/rmitagents>.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
